title: Diamond 3 Jungle/Mid main, Looking to give advice. (Maybe LFT)

embed.description: Point / Diamond 3 0LP / 194W 187L Win Ratio 51% / Kha'Zix - 40W 31L Win Ratio 56%, Elise - 20W 12L Win Ratio 63%, Graves - 19W 13L Win Ratio 59%, Syndra - 14W 10L Win Ratio 58%, Evelynn - 10W 12L Win Ratio 45%

body:
Hey guys Point here, Now I am not the best player and I flame on the odd occasion however I think I have good game knowledge and I'm happy to give it to anyone who is in need. I probably wont be watching game replays or anything that is extremely time intensive coz I still want to play the game myself unless I just wanna chill than I may be open to it. I'll mainly just be looking at your op.gg and ranked stats or just answering questions and giving my opinions on whats a good way to climb and who to climb with.

So I'f you think I may be able to give you some advice hit me up in game, Thanks guys.

replies.body:
Hiya :)

Bronze 5 {{champion:28}}  and {{champion:61}}  two-trick. Getting decent scores, but still haven't gotten anywhere in 2 years. I have also received coaching (which has helped), but whenever I gain LP I seem to lose it just as quickly.

Also, since I can see you're a Jg main, any good jungle tips? My coach told me about learning to predict where the enemy jungler is, but have no idea how to do that if they could be anywhere.

Thanks :)

OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Percival9
